text:
Created attachment 30897
The diff of the proposed fix

Notice 3 log statements missing a unique number. A unique number (APLOGNO) helps  a lot in debugging. Proposed fix is in attachment.

creator: asfbugz@velox.ch
text: Thanks, fixed in r1527925 and r1527926. Note that you need to update docs/log-message-tags/next-number as well.
